transcript.title: Brisbane Death
transcript.content:
PRIME MINISTER PRESS STATEMENT NO. 10

The Prime Minister, Mr. Whitlam, and the Attorney-General designate, Senator Murphy, today held discussionsÂ with officials of the Attorney-General's Department followingÂ a bomb blast in Brisbane resulting in the death of a 43-year
old American, Thomas Patrick Enright, last Friday.

Senator Murphy said later the relevant officialsÂ had been instructed to investigate any Commonwealth aspectÂ of the incident. A report would be made as soon as possible.

State authorities were co-operating.

CANBERRA. A. C. T.
11 December 1972
